docs.abstract: Plans for Republican National Convention reveal roster of speakers that will include football star Tim Tebow and others who are meant to broaden Donald Trump's demographic appeal.

headline.main: Speakers at Donald Trump’s Convention: Tim Tebow, Peter Thiel, but No Sarah Palin?
headline.print_headline: Speakers at Trump’s Convention: An Astronaut, a Quarterback, but No Palin

docs.snippet: Breaching boundaries on discussions of race, Mr. Trump has stoked antagonism among whites who feel disempowered and attracted college students tired of having to watch their words....
docs.lead_paragraph: Breaching boundaries on discussions of race, Mr. Trump has stoked antagonism among whites who feel disempowered and attracted college students tired of having to watch their words.
docs.abstract: Dozens of interviews with supporters of Donald Trump and those intrigued by his candidacy reveal that his stirring up of racial grievances on campaign trail has opened floodgates of white racial resentment in way not seen broadly in American society in half century.

headline.main: For Whites Sensing Decline, Donald Trump Unleashes Words of Resistance
headline.print_headline: Trump Mines Grievances of Whites Who Feel Lost

byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman and Kitty Bennett contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: It’s not enough to call for a “conversation.” To heal, the country needs strong policy ideas....
docs.lead_paragraph: It’s not enough to call for a “conversation.” To heal, the country needs strong policy ideas.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed by Prof John McWhorter criticizes idea, expressed in recent speech by Hillary Clinton, that solution to America's recent racial strife requires 'conversation'; asserts such dialogues invariably exclude controversial voices and have not been effective in past; argues concrete policies aimed at improving lives of poor blacks is better solution.

headline.main: What Clinton Should Have Said About Race
